entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1 except plus 5 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1 except plus 5 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:05 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:05 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
